channel.description: Well its got a pre-release on various torrent sites anyone grabbing this at the moment? anyone got it what you think? mines grabbing as fast as my bandwidth will allow atm so ive got a bout 20 minutes before i get it. item.title: Fifa 10
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:8, topic:304419”]Like £7.99 for the Prem League.

love this game on the PS3 and think that it is miles better than 09. I like the new fluid controls, and the general realism of the game. fucking pissed that you actually have to buy the Live Season mode. what dick at EA thought of making people pay for that shit. When I spend £35 quid on a game, I expect the whole fucking game! but other than that, im addicted.

Also, Manager Mode is 100% better.

its £24 at tescos and £26 at asda

Not for PS3 :([/quote]
ye the local asda near me was selling it for PS3 at £26
http://direct.tesco.com/q/R.206-4707.aspx
thats where im buying it from when i get paid

Read full topic

item.title: Fifa 10
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

graphics suck dix in this one, got it on max settings and fifa 09 still looks more polished and a whole lot better. THe controls are heavier you really need to hold dwon the mouse button to get a decent shots. Overall i prefer 09 for the PC

Read full topic

item.title: Fifa 10
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

It’s not as good as Fifa 09, the only appealing thing about it IMO is the new squads update. Saying this a lot of stupid things about the game have been fixed:

[ul][li]The power needed for chipping / lobbing.[/li]
[li]The varied effect you get from first time touches.[/li]
[li]The time taken from stopping to sprint to actually doing an action.[/li]
[li]Over powered players, e.g Ibrahimovic might be the best player to win a header etc, but he used to be able to outrun Christiano Ronaldo and Messi. [/li][/ul]

P.S - I can say it’s a waste of money for anyone who wants to buy it.

Read full topic
